Name: SAW READINESS STATE
Explanation: PROVIDES THE ABILITY TO SPECIFY READINESS STATE 0 TO READINESS STATE 9, IN LINE WITH DEFINITIONS PROVIDED BY "SHAPE STANDING DEFENCE PLAN (SDP) 10901D - ANGRY HASP" [NC] AND BY THE "COMAIRNORTH SUPPLAN 24600D CONSTANT EFFORT" FOR THE NORTHERN REGION INTEGRATED AIR DEFENCE SYSTEM (NRIADS), ANNEX H DATED 15 FEB 2000 [NC].

Name: GATEWAY OPERATIONAL STATUS NUMBER ONE CODE
GATEWAY OPERATIONAL STATUS NUMBER TWO CODE
STATUS OF ENEMY AIRCRAFT
Explanation: THE OPERATIONAL STATUS OF ENEMY AIRCRAFT TO PERFORM ITS/THEIR MISSION. RELATED DOCUMENT: STANAG 5621.

Name: STATUS OF ENEMY UNIT
Explanation: THE OPERATIONAL STATUS OF AN ENEMY UNIT TO PERFORM ITS MISSION. RELATED DOCUMENT: STANAG 5621

Name: STATUS OF TARGET OPERABILITY
Explanation: OPERATIONAL STATUS/CONDITION OF A TARGET. E.G. OPR, MOB.

Name: STATUS OF TARGET SERVICEABILITY
Explanation: THE SERVICEABILITY OF A TARGET. E.G. NORM, MOVE.

Name: OPERATIONAL STATUS OF KEY POINT
Explanation: DESCRIBES THE OPERATIONAL STATUS OF A KEY POINT.

Name: AIR BASE STATUS
Explanation: THE AIRBASE CAPABILITY TO SUPPORT ITS ASSIGNED OPERATIONS.

Name: PLACE OPERATIONAL STATUS
Explanation: INDICATES THE DEGREE TO WHICH A PLACE IS READY TO PERFORM THE OVERALL OPERATIONAL MISSION.

Name: NEXT AIR BASE STATUS
Explanation: THE NEXT CAPABILITY THE AIRBASE WILL HAVE TO SUPPORT ITS ASSIGNED MISSION.

Name: UNIT OPERATIONAL READINESS STATUS
Explanation: DEGREE TO WHICH AN ENTITY IS READY TO PERFORM THE OVERALL OPERATIONAL MISSION(S) FOR WHICH IT WAS ORGANISED AND EQUIPPED.

Name: UNIT OPERATIONAL STATUS
Explanation: PROVIDES THE CODE FOR THE CURRENT OPERATIONAL STATUS OF THE REPORTING UNIT.

Name: COMMAND AND CONTROL FUNCTION OPERATIONAL STATUS
Explanation: PROVIDES THE CODE FOR THE CURRENT OPERATIONAL STATUS OF THE REPORTING UNIT.

Name: SURFACE-TO-AIR WEAPONS OPERATIONAL STATUS
Explanation: THE CAPABILITY OF A SURFACE-TO-AIR UNIT TO PERFORM THE MISSIONS OR FUNCTIONS FOR WHICH IT IS ORGANIZED OR DESIGNED, FROM RELEASED TO FULLY OPERATIONAL STATUS.

Name: NEXT BASE OPERATIONAL STATUS
Explanation: PROVIDES THE CODE FOR THE OPERATIONAL STATUS THAT THE REPORTING UNIT ANTICIPATES FOR NEXT REPORT.

Name: TARGET OPERATIONAL STATUS
Explanation: INDICATES THE DEGREE TO WHICH A CHOSEN TARGET IS READY TO PERFORM THE OVERALL OPERATIONAL MISSION.

Name: TARGET ACTIVITY STATUS
Explanation: THE PERCEIVED PHYSICAL CONDITION, OPERATIONAL STATUS, OR OCCUPANCY STATUS OF A TARGET/ACTIVITY.
